content:
Privacy Policy of the ‘Welcome to
 
AGH UST’ mobile application
 
This
Privacy
Policy
describes
the
terms
and
conditions
related
to
the
processing
and
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
protection
of
personal
information
provided
by
the
Users
in
connection
with
using
the
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
‘Welcome to AGH UST’ mobile application.
 
Any
personal
information
provided
to
or
gathered
by
the
‘Welcome
to
AGH
UST’
mobile
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
application
is
controlled
by
the
AGH
University
of
Science
and
Technology
in
Krakow
at
Al.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Mickiewicza
30,
30-059
Krakow,
Poland,
(Data
Controller)
being
a
legal
entity
pursuant
to
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Article
9
of
the
Act
of
20
July
2018
–
Law
on
higher
education
and
science
(Dz.U.
(Journal
of
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Laws)
of
2018,
item
1668),
NIP
(Tax
Identification
Number)
675
000
19
23,
REGON
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
(National Business Register Number) 000001577.
 
Personal Information is processed pursuant to the authorisation given by the User.
 
The
‘Welcome
to
AGH
UST’
mobile
application
gathers
information
about
users
and
their
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
behaviour in the following ways:
 
●
by means of voluntary provision of information
 
 
●
by
means
of
gathering
cookies
(more
information
concerning
the
cookies
policy
is
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
available on the website 
​
www.agh.edu.pl/polityka-obslugi-plikow-cookies.
 
The
‘Welcome
to
AGH
UST’
mobile
application
gathers
information
that
is
voluntarily
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
provided by the User.
 
Personal
information
provided
to
the
‘Welcome
to
AGH
UST’
mobile
application
will
not
be
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
sold
or
made
available
to
third
parties,
in
compliance
with
the
regulations
of
the
General
Data
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Protection Regulation.
 
Every
person
who
has
provided
personal
information
to
the
application
has
a
right
to
access
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
the
information.
Every
person
also
has
a
right
to
cancel
personal
information
processing
on
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
his own at any time.
 
We
reserve
the
right
to
change
the
Privacy
Policy
of
the
‘Welcome
to
AGH
UST’
mobile
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
application,
which
may
result
from
the
development
of
the
Internet
technologies,
or
the
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
changes
of
the
law
with
respect
to
the
protection
of
personal
information,
or
the
development
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
of
the
services
that
we
provide.
Any
changes
will
be
made
available
to
the
public
in
a
clear
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
and visible way.
 
The
‘Welcome
to
AGH
UST’
mobile
application
may
contain
links
to
other
Internet
websites.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
These
Internet
websites
operate
independently
of
the
application
and
are
not
controlled
by
the
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

application
in
any
way.
These
websites
may
also
have
their
own
privacy
policies
as
well
as
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
their own terms and conditions, which we recommend to become familiar with.
 
If
you
have
any
doubts
concerning
this
privacy
policy
notice,
we
will
be
pleased
to
answer
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
your questions. Contact us at 
​
kand@agh.edu.pl
